atlantic.title: 7 Truly Amazing Reasons to Care About NASA's New Satellite
atlantic.topComment: Yet another story about the GOP sabotaging the country they pretend to serve. Thank you for shedding some light on this one. How those guys find voters is beyond me. Edit to SeaMaestro: That evidences your poor reading skills. Try again.

atlantic.title: Democracy, Deferred
atlantic.topComment: Goodluck Jonathan was facing the prospect of being the first sitting Nigerian President not be to re-elected to another term. This honor in every nation starting it's democracy was evidently too much for his ego to handle, so he's "postponed" the ele...
